attributes.action: Enable Election Voting via Smartphone App and Internet Access
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the current low voter registration and participation, especially with the younger demographic, given the abilities of modern technology and the internet, voting should be accessible via easier and more convenient measures such as mobile applications and the internet.

This access should also be extended to provide a means of gathering public opinion on matters which could be put to referendum and also used as a cost effective way to gather public opinion poles rather than waste unquantifiable amounts of tax payers money.
